overview: Lucy the Axe is an axe dropped by the Deerclops.
Its best modifier is Light for harvesting purposes and Legendary for combat purposes.
notes: Lucy the Axe is the only item with voice lines
Additionally, Lucy the Axe seems to cycle through their voice lines rather than picking randomly
Lucy the Axe will make the player emote the Axe Emote whenever it speaks.
title: Lucy the Axe
